comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Lieutenant General Sir Launcelot Edward Kiggell KCB KCMG (2 October 1862 – 23 February 1954) was a British Army officer. .. He was Chief of General Staff for the British Armies in France under Sir Douglas Haig from late 1915 to 1918. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Launcelot_Kiggell See also www.kingscollections.org/catalogues/lhcma/collection/k-o/... The same photo in www.bridgemanart.com/asset/359652/Freaerio-Robinson-Photo... and www.pictorialgems.com/1915-General-Lancelot-Kiggell-Chief...
